derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English mōrberie, from Latin morum + berry; related to Dutch moerbezie and German Maulbeere

entry.def: A mulberry or a mulberry tree is a tree which has small purple berries which you can eat.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several trees of the genus Morus having edible fruit that resembles the blackberry
2. sweet usually dark purple blackberry-like fruit of any of several mulberry trees of the genus Morus
